meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by high blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent1: The hyperglycemic patient needed insulin to lower their blood sugar.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the hyperglycemic condition based on the high glucose levels.
meanings.sent3: The hyperglycemic teddy bear only wanted to eat candy all day.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperglycemic energy was like a rollercoaster, up and down all day.
meanings.sent5: The hyperglycemic sky seemed to rain sugar instead of water.

meanings.definition: Having an excess of glucose in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent1: The hyperglycemic child's sweet tooth led to constant sugar highs.
meanings.sent2: The hyperglycemic individual had to monitor their blood sugar levels regularly.
meanings.sent3: The hyperglycemic cupcake was the star of the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: His hyperglycemic smile was as sweet as a candy shop.
meanings.sent5: The hyperglycemic river flowed with syrup instead of water.
